title: About us
paragraph1: We are proud to present our project led by the creative mind of Rafa García Ordoñez. With an innate passion for creation and a deep connection to the digital world, Rafa has been the primary creator behind our platform.
paragraph2: With a clear vision and exceptional talent, Rafa has carried out the development of this website, aiming to provide an online space that reflects the academic excellence and diverse activities carried out at IES Trasierra.
paragraph3: Rafa's commitment to innovation and quality is evident in every aspect of this website. From visual design to usability, he has dedicated himself to ensuring that visitors enjoy an enriching and seamless experience while navigating through our site.
